name: Phonograph
description:
Phonograph is a 1st person ghost-communication game where you speak into an old phonograph machine.

Here's an example of one:

In this game, you go  through an old researcher's office, looking for clues the ghost left you before they died. You talk to the ghost through the phonograph. This game has speech-to-text capabilities.

Watch the gameplay video for a test.

Controls:

W A S D - Move player

Mouse - Move camera, interact with objects

ESCAPE - Show cursor

TAB - Show objectives

Speech-to-text

Hold down LEFT CLICK while talking into the phonograph. It will listen to your input audio, perform speech-to-text, and then return the text.

This game makes a network call to a Python REST service I made during the jam: https://gist.github.com/urodelagames/6ad8a429e73d114e64467988854e8eb0

This service does the speech-to-text capabilities.
